00047 template<unsigned DIM>
00048 class SurfaceAreaConstraintPottsUpdateRule : public AbstractPottsUpdateRule<DIM>
00049 {
00050 friend class TestPottsUpdateRules;
00051 
00052 private:
00053 
00059     double mDeformationEnergyParameter;
00060 
00067     double mMatureCellTargetSurfaceArea;
00068 
00069     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00070     template<class Archive>
00071     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00072     {
00073         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<AbstractPottsUpdateRule<DIM> >(*this);
00074         archive & mDeformationEnergyParameter;
00075         archive & mMatureCellTargetSurfaceArea;
00076     }
00077 
00078 public:
00079 
00083     SurfaceAreaConstraintPottsUpdateRule();
00084 
00088     ~SurfaceAreaConstraintPottsUpdateRule();
00089 
00102     double EvaluateHamiltonianContribution(unsigned currentNodeIndex,
00103                                            unsigned targetNodeIndex,
00104                                            PottsBasedCellPopulation<DIM>& rCellPopulation);
00105 
00109     double GetDeformationEnergyParameter();
00110

00117 
00121     double GetMatureCellTargetSurfaceArea() const;
00122

00129 
00135     void OutputUpdateRuleParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile);
00136 };
